title: Part-time LINC
subtitle: LINC stands for Language Instruction for Newcomers to Canada. In this part time program, you'll learn listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills. With LINC, you can get the knowledge you need to settle in Canada.

title: LINC Home Study
subtitle: LINC stands for Language Instruction for Newcomers to Canada. This program is offered online and by correspondence. Learners work one-on-one with an instructor 1/2 hour every week.

title: Full-time LINC
subtitle: LINC stands for Language Instruction for Newcomers to Canada. In LINC, you'll learn listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills. You'll get the knowledge you need to settle in Canada.

subtitle: LINC stands for Language Instruction for Newcomers to Canada. This full-time program is for immigrant youth between the ages of 18 and 24.

subtitle: Are your lifesaving skills up to date?

title: Time Management Strategies
subtitle: Improve effectiveness by managing time through organization, prioritization and delegation.

title: Intercultural Competence 1
subtitle: Develop an awareness of the basic skills needed to interact and work more effectively with others from diverse backgrounds.

title: Supervisory Skills in Intercultural Teams
subtitle: Learn the skills to confidently supervise and lead diverse teams with a global and inclusive mindset.

title: Intercultural Competence 2
subtitle: Build motivation and curiosity and develop the requisite attitudes for working towards successful intercultural interactions.

title: Standard Childcare First Aid & CPR (Red Cross)
subtitle: Standard First Aid and CPR for children and infants

title: Standard First Aid with Basic Life Support (HCP) CPR - St. John Ambulance
subtitle: Required for medical office assistant, veterinary office assistant, hospital unit clerk, and dental business assistant program work placements.

title: Sterile Compounding Recertification - Non-hazardous
subtitle: This recertification course is designed to fulfill the requirements of NAPRA's Model Standards for Pharmacy Compounding of Non-Hazardous Sterile Preparations' competency assessment program.

title: Advanced Sterile Preparation
subtitle: Pharmacy Technicians and Pharmacists will further develop aseptic technique skills to prepare intravenous admixtures.

title: Hazardous Product Preparation
subtitle: Pharmacy Technicians and Pharmacists will learn to prepare hazardous products while demonstrating appropriate aseptic technique.

title: Sterile Compounding Recertification - Hazardous
subtitle: This recertification course is designed to fulfill the requirements of NAPRA's Model Standards for Pharmacy Compounding of Hazardous Sterile Preparations' competency assessment program.

title: Basic Sterile Preparation
subtitle: This course is for Pharmacy Technicians and Pharmacists who prepare sterile products.

title: Supporting Culturally and Linguistically Diverse Learners in College Career Programs
subtitle: Learn how to support culturally and linguistically diverse learners in your classroom.

title: My Software Diploma
subtitle: Gain the skills you need to create the latest computer, mobile, and gaming applications. Prepare to transform your ideas into reality all while developing your problem-solving skills.
